property.name: title
property.label: Title
property.description: Clearly identifies the primary purpose or action of the site, service or product.

property.name: content
property.label: Content
property.description: Gives additional context when the title alone would be insufficient - in Markdown format.
property.default: From 14-21 May, take the pledge and look for ways you can drive so others survive.

property.name: theme
property.label: Colour theme
property.description: Colour theme applied to the background of the callout.

property.name: buttonLink
property.label: Button link
property.description: Link used for a button in Markdown format - leave blank for no button.

property.name: imageSrc
property.label: Image
property.description: Image used as a further illustration - leave blank for no image.

property.name: imageAlt
property.label: Image alternative text
property.description: Text used as an alternative should there be an issue with the image.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
